mapper.select: select count(*) from apt_complex where complex_address like #{addr}

select * from (select rownum rnum, complex_address, complex_apartname, complex_pdate, complex_subway, complex_station, complex_foot,minarea, maxarea, minprice,maxprice from (select c.complex_address, c.complex_apartname, c.complex_pdate, c.complex_subway, c.complex_station, c.complex_foot, min(a.apart_area) minarea ,max(a.apart_area) maxarea, min(a.apart_price) minprice ,max(a.apart_price) maxprice from apt_complex c, apartment a where c.complex_id = a.complex_id and c.complex_address like #{addr} group by c.complex_address, c.complex_apartname, c.complex_pdate, c.complex_subway, c.complex_station, c.complex_foot order by c.complex_pdate asc)) where rnum > = #{start} and rnum < = #{end}
